episodes.title: The Phantom cult leader obsessed with Jim Jones |Veterans the perfect prey| $23 million scam
episodes.description:
This is the story of a church with no clear origin, a pastor with no verifiable past, and a trail of deceit targeting America's veterans. Under the guise of holiness, someone is orchestrating a scheme cloaked in scripture, draining the faithful and forgotten. The "House of Prayer Church of Christ" appears like a whisper in the night—then vanishes with souls and savings in tow.
